UIControl.Name: talk3
UIControl.Text:
<=(146,243,255)>Series Quest: Sansheng Stone - The Truth in Dreams (2/8)
Fortuneteller Chunyun said you need to find the Sansheng Stone to help Zhou Lingyun. Bring this information to Zhou Lingyun in Liuhe (531,470).Yichen g Yamen Watchman (2/3) Return to the Yicheng Yamen Watchman <<=(85,245,183)><linkstart=0>Yicheng,662,261 <linkend><=(146,243,255)>>.
